problem_text: For trapezoid T R S V, M and N are midpoints of the legs. If V S = 21 and T R = 44, find M N.
compact_text: For trapezoid TRSV, M and N are midpoints of the legs. If VS = 21 and TR = 44, find MN.
annotat_text: For trapezoid $T R S V, M$ and $N$ are midpoints of the legs. If $V S=21$ and $T R=44,$ find $M N$
